DOC.brief_summary: Type 2 diabetes create health pandemic globally . Management type 2 diabetes involves combination lifestyle intervention drug intervention , include sodium-glucose transporter 2 ( SGLT-2 ) inhibitor , dapagliflozin . Dapagliflozin ( ForxigaÂ® ) approve Malaysian Drug Authority treatment type 2 diabetes 2014 . This study describe characteristic patient prescribed dapagliflozin diabetologists/endocrinologists tertiary referral center describe glycaemic control , weight , renal function baseline use dapagliflozin .
DOC.brief_title: Real World Experience Dapaglifozin Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The prevalence type 2 diabetes among adult > 18 year old 17.5 % Malaysia , half undiagnosed . Diabetes also account 14.5 % all-cause mortality worldwide , close half death subject < 60 year old . These highlight importance early diagnosis disease , timely intervention appropriate therapy , treat type 2 diabetes patient goal prevent development complication . Asian type 2 diabetes phenotype different Caucasians , i.e . significant pancreatic beta-cell dysfunction , high visceral adiposity , vulnerable cardio-renal complication . Although clinical trial SGLT-2 inhibitor publish , real-world data use new class antidiabetic medication still lack , particularly among Asians .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis type 2 diabetes prior first prescription dapaglifozin Patients type 2 diabetes initiate dapaglifozin March 2014 till December 2015 Patients need dapaglifozin therapy least six consecutive month index date Patients need diabetologists/endocrinologists ' follow least six month initiation dapaglifozin Patients type 2 diabetes initiate dapaglifozin December 2015 Patients incomplete electronic medical record Patients Type 1 diabetes Patients latent autoimmune diabetes adult ( LADA ) Female Patients T2DM find pregnant treatment period dapaglifozin
